mapper.select: select project_no, project_title, p_status, p_start_date, p_end_date from project join project_join using(project_no) join member on(project_member=email) where p_status like '진행%' and project_member = #{email} order by project_no
select project_no, project_title, project_member, nickname from project join project_join using(project_no) join member on(project_member = email) where project_no = #{projectNo}
select * from calendar join member on(c_creator=email) where project_no = #{pNo} and c_category like '진행%' and c_status = 'Y' order by calendar_no

select * from (select * from project join project_join using(project_no) join member on(project_member=email) where p_status like '진행%' and project_member = #{pCreater}) where (p_start_date between #{pStartDate} and #{pEndDate}) or (p_end_date between #{pStartDate} and #{pEndDate}) order by project_no

select * from (select * from project join project_join using(project_no) join member on(project_member=email) where p_status like '진행%' and project_member = #{pCreater}) where (p_start_date between to_date(#{pStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{pEndDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) or (p_end_date between to_date(#{pStartDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and to_date(#{pEndDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) order by project_no
select email,name,nickname,reprofile from project_join join member on(project_member = email) where project_no = #{projectNo}
select email,name,nickname,reprofile from member join project_join on(project_member = email) where project_no != #{projectNo}
select email,name,nickname,reprofile from member join project_join on(project_member = email) where project_no != #{projectNo} and email like '%'||#{email}||'%'
